Title: Alive
Manufacturer: Brunswick Manufacturing Company, of Chicago, Illinois, USA (1932-1980)
ManufacturerShortName: Brunswick Manufacturing Company, of Chicago, Illinois, USA (1932-1980)
NotableFeatures:
Flippers (2), Pop bumper (1), Slingshots (2), Standup targets (3), Spinning targets (3), Action ring, Free ball return lane. The outhole is not a kick-out hole as found in coin-operated pin games but has, next to the outhole, what the manual's parts list refers to as a "flipper". It is identical to the player's flippers and is used to flip the outhole ball to the shooter lane. 6-digit score display.

Sound: electronic
Notes: Although this game can spell out some simple words (like "OUCH" when tilted), it does *not* have alpha-numeric displays.
